note.p: Birth: The under-secretary's lodge, Phoenix Park, Dublin, Ireland (12 or 13 July 1816)
Death: St George's Place, London (06 March 1892)
Education: Harrow School; Christ Church, Oxford (no degree)
Career: MP for Dublin (1842-1847); Privy Councillor (1871); Governor of Ceylon (1871); resigned (1877) Trustee of the National Gallery
Notes: Boase gives birth date as 13 July 1817
